title: The Last of the Mohicans
description: C&C Web Press brings you James Fenimore Cooper's classic novel, The Last of the Mohicans. This selection includes an active table of contents."It was a feature peculiar to the colonial wars of North America, that the toils and dangers of the wilderness were to be encountered before the adverse hosts could meet. A wide and apparently an impervious boundary of forests severed the possessions of the hostile provinces of France and England".
author: James Fenimore Cooper
